cosmos.question: I'm the star you see every day, shining bright, helping plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot.
🌞 I rise in the East and set in the West.
🌻 Without me, there would be no plants.

cosmos.question: I am big and round and spin around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌎 I am the third planet from the Sun.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light in the night sky that orbits the Earth. Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Some people say werewolves appear when I'm full.
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, known for rust and dust. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My surface is red.
🚀 People are planning to visit me one day.
🔥 I am named after the Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system, with a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am made of gas.
🔴 My spot is a huge storm.
🪐 I am the fifth planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I'm a ball of ice and dust with a tail that can be seen from Earth. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I'm like a dirty snowball.
💨 My tail points away from the sun.
💫 Halley's is a famous one.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa Major, also known as the Big Dipper is a type of me
✨ You can find me using a star map.
🏹 I am often named after animals or mythological figures.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🌌 The Milky Way is my name.
🔭 There are billions of us in the universe.

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
⭐ New stars are made within me.
🔭 The Eagle and Orion are types of me.

cosmos.question: I am what is left after a big star explodes. I am super bright, but I don't last forever. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am a powerful explosion.
✨ I can outshine an entire galaxy.
💀 A neutron star or black hole may be left behind.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm the largest land animal.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
💤 I spend most of the day sleeping.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse but with stripes.
🌿 I eat grass.
🏃 I run in herds.

animal.question: I quack and swim in ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🍞 I like to eat bread crumbs.
🪿 I am a water bird.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have brown spots.
🌳 I am the tallest mammal.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am native to Australia.
🦘 I can jump really far.
🌱 I eat plants.

animal.question: I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a mane around my neck.
🥩 I am a predator and eat meat.
👑 I am a symbol of courage.

animal.question: I build dams and love to gnaw on wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have large front teeth to gnaw wood.
🏠 I create my own homes in water.
🇨🇦 I am a national symbol of Canada.

animal.question: I hiss and slither, and some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin as I grow.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🦎 I am a legless reptile.

animal.question: I am a bird of prey known for my sharp talons and keen eyesight. What am I?

hints.text: 🦅 I often soar high in the sky, looking for prey.
🎣 I am a skilled hunter with strong talons.
🇺🇸 I am a symbol of freedom in the United States.
